document_data.name: Vodka
document_data.mainbody: '''Vodka''' was a clear and high-proof distilled alcoholic beverage rarely encountered in the [[Realms]].
document_data.History:
Famously, the great [[wizard]] [[Otiluke]] of [[Oerth]], in his younger days, partook in boastful dares from [[Bigby]], chugging thirteen liters of vodka whilst being protected by a ''[[cloak of protection]]''.

In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the author of ''[[Moxy's Mixology Manual]]'' shared their denigrating opinion on mixed drinks made with vodka, [[vermouth]], and [[rum]] in their [[book]].
